story_21_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Phew! We made it just in time!
We would have missed the opening ceremony
if we hadn’t run here from the volcano!
story_21_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah! Do you think we might have time to
take a—
story_21_01000/2401_1101_0300_20:
We will be commencing the opening ceremony
momentarily. All participating teams, please
line up.
story_21_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: break? Heh, I guess not. Shall we?
story_21_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
What’s wrong, Rosa?
We have to get going.
story_21_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Yeah, I know... I just thought I saw Paulo
over there.
story_21_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Paulo? He must have made it to the finals, too,
then. That’s great news!
story_21_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I’d like to say hi to him as well, but first we have
to line up! Let’s go find him after the ceremony.
